DOC.brief_summary: The aim study monitor impact change lyophilise formulation liquid formulation Rotarix™ vaccine hospitalisation rotavirus gastroenteritis . This plan assessed comparing trend hospitalisation due laboratory confirm rotavirus gastroenteritis child < =5 year age , introduction liquid formulation vaccine Belgium .
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Rotavirus Gastroenteritis Epidemiology , Impact Lyophilised v . Liquid Formulation Rotarix™
DOC.criteria: All subject must satisfy ALL follow criterion study entry : Child age ≤5 year opportunity receive lyophilise liquid formulation Rotarix™ ; Hospitalised one participating centre Belgium ; A stool sample provide rotavirus detection test study period ; Laboratory test result rotavirus available . • None .
